00040 #ifndef _plane_cpp
00041 #define _plane_cpp
00042 
00043 #include <iostream>
00044 #include <memory>
00045 
00046 #include "exception.h"
00047 #include "plane.h"
00048 #include "world.h"
00049 #include "xml.h"
00050 
00051 #include "Ogre.h"
00052 
00053 namespace phys
00054 {
00055 
00056     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00057     // Constructors
00058     Plane::Plane() : Normal(0,0,0), Distance(0)
00059         {}
00060 
00061     Plane::Plane(Vector3 Normal_, Real Distance_) : Normal(Normal_),Distance(Distance_)
00062         {}
00063 
00064     Plane::Plane(Ogre::Plane Plane_)
00065         { this->ExtractOgrePlane(Plane_); }
00066 
00067     Plane::Plane(const Vector3& rkPoint0, const Vector3& rkPoint1, const Vector3& rkPoint2)
00068     {
00069         Vector3 kEdge1 = rkPoint1 - rkPoint0;
00070                 Vector3 kEdge2 = rkPoint2 - rkPoint0;
00071                 this->Normal = kEdge1.CrossProduct(kEdge2);
00072                 this->Normal.Normalize();
00073                 this->Distance = -this->Normal.dotProduct(rkPoint0);
00074     }
00075 
00076     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00077     // Conversions and adjustments
00078     Ogre::Plane Plane::GetOgrePlane() const
00079         { return Ogre::Plane( Normal.GetOgreVector3(), Distance); }
00080 
00081     void Plane::ExtractOgrePlane(const Ogre::Plane& Plane2)
00082     {
00083         this->Normal=Plane2.normal;
00084         this->Distance=Plane2.d;
00085     }
00086 
00087     void Plane::operator=(const Ogre::Plane& Plane2)
00088         { this->ExtractOgrePlane(Plane2); }
00089 
00090 }
00091 #ifdef PHYSXML
00092 std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const phys::Plane& x)
00093 {
00094     stream << "<Plane Version=\"1\" Distance=\"" << x.Distance << "\" >" << x.Normal << "</Plane>";
00095     return stream;
00096 }
00097 
00098 
00099 std::istream& PHYS_LIB operator >> (std::istream& stream, phys::Plane& x)
00100 {
00101     phys::String OneTag( phys::xml::GetOneTag(stream) );
00102     std::auto_ptr<phys::xml::Document> Doc( phys::xml::PreParseClassFromSingleTag("phys::", "Plane", OneTag) );
00103 
00104     Doc->GetFirstChild() >> x;
00105 
00106     return stream;
00107 }
00108 
00109 phys::xml::Node& PHYS_LIB operator >> (const phys::xml::Node& OneNode, phys::Plane& x)
00110 {
00111     if(OneNode.GetAttribute("Version").AsInt() == 1)
00112     {
00113         x.Distance=OneNode.GetAttribute("Distance").AsReal();
00114         if(OneNode.GetFirstChild())
00115         {
00116             OneNode.GetFirstChild() >> x.Normal;
00117         }else{
00118             throw(phys::Exception("Normal not found while parsing phys::Plane"));
00119         }
00120     }else{
00121         throw( phys::Exception("Incompatible XML Version for Vector3: Not Version 1"));
00122     }
00123 }
00124 
00125 #endif // \phys_xml

00127 #endif
